title: Perma banned
body:
Dont mind it, I was toxic w/e. Reason being was this game is honeslty infuriating. Not because of anyone is particular but the champions are aids

Being a toplane main and going vs Fiora, Riven, Tryndamere, Darius, Irelia, Jax, Akali, Aatrox, Urgot, Kled, Pantheon and Renekton. All there bullshit ways of killing and surviving honeslty take a toll. It feels like skill doesnt even matter. Nothing feels worse than beating a Trynda into 2/5 only to have him beat you down behind a tower by clicking R. Maining immobile champions and going vs the likes of Irelia and Riven who just dance around you while out damaging and sustaining you. It feels so bad to play this game, Im happy im banned because I really was addicted.

 Every patch I just hoped for some damage nerfs, for a chance to express skill. For a chance of longer and more chilled games. A game where if I die once it does not mean Irelia can start one shotting me with sheen or Tynrda starts 3 hitting me with Zeal or Renekton who just kills you once he reaches lvl 3.

People are so toxic aswell that it begins to rub off on you. Its just a self destructive game. I had my fun with {{champion:122}}, I met some nice people and did some nice plays but beyond that, this is goodbye.

Quick Summary, Game 1 was vs Tryndamere, 2 lucky crits I got tilted flamed game design

Game 2, Diana went 0/9 (made a post about this) and I light flamed her for not ganking and for flaming us not herself,

Game 3, Irelia and Lee sin premades mindlessly tower diving me while maintaining higher farm and drake control meanwhile my Khazix flames me for feeding.

Bye.

(Time to try Apex Legends)
